thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: Mike Bates
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Mike Bates

author: Mike Bates
title: Mike Bates
text: Got the hard drive from cex as my attempts to get a good price led to them. Item was delivered quickly as was new and worked perfect on xbox one which is what i wanted it for. Been useing cex for many years but never bought online as shops ar local to me. glad i did now as it was quick and convinient to use and has convinced me to use a lot more often for them illusive items not in the shop.
